```{r hist}
hist(runif(1000))

means <- NULL

for (i in 1:1000) {
    means = c(means, mean(runif(40)))
}

hist(means)
```

```{r lln1}
n <- 10000
means <- cumsum(rnorm(n)) / (1 : n)
library(ggplot2)
g <- ggplot(data.frame(x = 1 : n, y = means), aes(x = x, y = y)) 
g <- g + geom_hline(yintercept = 0) + geom_line(size = 2) 
g <- g + labs(x = "Number of obs", y = "Cumulative mean")
g
```
